author: Ian Hamilton
title: Starship Drift Shows Game Devs Are Learning To Utilize Apple Vision Pro
description: An endless runner for Apple Vision Pro shows how game devs are figuring out the platform.
content:
Starship Drift is an exceedingly simple game on Apple Vision Pro that shows how developers are figuring out how to make the most of the platform.
Starship Drift puts the player in command of a tiny … [+1705 chars]
